name: Petzl William Ball Lock Carabiner
description: A large, pear-shaped locking carabiner that’s great for belaying and rappelling. It can easily accommodate a Munter hitch with both single and double ropes. The large size also makes it useful for anchoring multiple ropes and slings, and keeping belays organized.Ball-lock system automatically locks, resists accidental opening, and is easily opened one-handed.Green button indicates when gate is locked.
